name: Aven Envoy
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Their grieving faces tell far more than a list of casualties ever could.

name: Aven Redeemer
oracle_text:
Flying
{T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor_text: Redeemers rise with the sun, and the spirits of the people rise with them.

name: Berserk Murlodont
oracle_text: Whenever a Beast becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.
flavor_text:
"The harder we press forward, the harder Krosa pushes us back."
—Aven scout

name: Blood Celebrant
oracle_text: {B}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text:
"Their blood is the nectar that nourishes the Cabal."
—Phage the Untouchable

name: Bloodstoke Howler
oracle_text:
Morph {6}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Bloodstoke Howler is turned face up, Beast creatures you control get +3/+0 until end of turn.

name: Cephalid Pathmage
oracle_text:
Cephalid Pathmage can't be blocked.
{T}, Sacrifice Cephalid Pathmage: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: Pathmages can open doors that aren't even there.

name: Covert Operative
oracle_text: Covert Operative can't be blocked.
flavor_text: Some spies seek clarity. Others seek transparency.

name: Crested Craghorn
oracle_text:
Haste
Provoke (Whenever this creature attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
flavor_text:
"Craghorns experience a wide range of emotions: rage, fury, anger . . ."
—Foothill guide

name: Crypt Sliver
oracle_text: All Slivers have "{T}: Regenerate target Sliver."
flavor_text:
"Death couldn't contain the slivers. What made us think we could?"
—Riptide Project researcher

name: Daru Sanctifier
oracle_text:
Morph {1}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Daru Sanctifier is turned face up, destroy target enchantment.

name: Daru Stinger
oracle_text:
Amplify 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Soldier card you reveal in your hand.)
{T}: Daru Stinger deals damage equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it to target attacking or blocking creature.

name: Defiant Elf
oracle_text: Trample
flavor_text: "I lost one home when Yavimaya was destroyed. I will not lose another."

name: Deftblade Elite
oracle_text:
Provoke (Whenever this creature attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
{1}{W}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by Deftblade Elite this turn.

name: Dripping Dead
oracle_text:
Dripping Dead can't block.
Whenever Dripping Dead deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text: It oozes death from every pore.

name: Echo Tracer
oracle_text:
Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Echo Tracer is turned face up, return target creature to its owner's hand.

name: Embalmed Brawler
oracle_text:
Amplify 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Zombie card you reveal in your hand.)
Whenever Embalmed Brawler attacks or blocks, you lose 1 life for each +1/+1 counter on it.

name: Flamewave Invoker
oracle_text: {7}{R}: Flamewave Invoker deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: The Mirari burns in his heart.

name: Fugitive Wizard
flavor_text: Many wizards came to the Riptide Project hoping to return home with answers. Most, however, wouldn't return home at all.

name: Gempalm Avenger
oracle_text:
Cycling {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Gempalm Avenger, Soldier creatures get +1/+1 and gain first strike until end of turn.

name: Gempalm Polluter
oracle_text:
Cycling {B}{B} ({B}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Gempalm Polluter, you may have target player lose life equal to the number of Zombies on the battlefield.

name: Glintwing Invoker
oracle_text: {7}{U}: Glintwing Invoker gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: The Mirari flares in his mind.

name: Glowering Rogon
oracle_text: Amplify 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Beast card you reveal in your hand.)
flavor_text: A herd of one.

name: Goblin Firebug
oracle_text: When Goblin Firebug leaves the battlefield, sacrifice a land.
flavor_text: Most goblins leave behind a wake of destruction. A few goblins take one with them.

name: Goblin Grappler
oracle_text: Provoke (Whenever this creature attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
flavor_text: Daru soldiers learned it's better to have a clean death from a sharp blade than to tangle with a goblin's rusted chains.

name: Goblin Lookout
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Goblin creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Throw rocks at 'em! Throw spears at 'em! Throw Furt at 'em!"

name: Goblin Turncoat
oracle_text: Sacrifice a Goblin: Regenerate Goblin Turncoat.
flavor_text:
"Goblins won't betray their own kind for any price. They'll do it for a very specific price."
—Phage the Untouchable

name: Hundroog
oracle_text: Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text:
"New links are being added to the food chain on a daily basis."
—Riptide Project researcher

name: Hunter Sliver
oracle_text: All Sliver creatures have provoke. (Whenever a Sliver attacks, its controller may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
flavor_text: Once they get the scent, there is no escape.

name: Infernal Caretaker
oracle_text:
Morph {3}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Infernal Caretaker is turned face up, return all Zombie cards from all graveyards to their owners' hands.

name: Keeneye Aven
oracle_text:
Flying
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: "I have no need of a map. The very continent itself guides my way."

name: Krosan Vorine
oracle_text:
Provoke (Whenever this creature attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
Krosan Vorine can't be blocked by more than one creature.

name: Lowland Tracker
oracle_text:
First strike
Provoke (Whenever this creature attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
flavor_text:
"I feed my hatred to the righteous and they join my crusade."
—Akroma, angelic avenger

name: Macetail Hystrodon
oracle_text:
First strike, haste
Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: The goblins tracked the hystrodon with much stealth and cunning. Then they were eaten with much pain and yelling.

name: Merchant of Secrets
oracle_text: When Merchant of Secrets enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text: To scrape out a living in Aphetto, wizards are reduced to selling rumors, lies, forgeries, or—if they get desperate enough—the truth.

name: Mistform Seaswift
oracle_text:
Flying
{1}: Mistform Seaswift becomes the creature type of your choice until end of turn.
Morph {1}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

name: Mistform Sliver
oracle_text: All Slivers have "{1}: This permanent becomes the creature type of your choice in addition to its other types until end of turn."
flavor_text: Taking the form of a junior researcher, the first sliver slipped out of Riptide.

name: Nantuko Vigilante
oracle_text:
Morph {1}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Nantuko Vigilante is turned face up, destroy target artifact or enchantment.

name: Needleshot Gourna
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: The first aven scout squad returned from Krosa with disturbing stories. The second returned with disturbing casualties.

name: Patron of the Wild
oracle_text:
Morph {2}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Patron of the Wild is turned face up, target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

name: Plated Sliver
oracle_text: All Sliver creatures get +0/+1.
flavor_text: Overcoming extinction has only made the slivers more determined to live.

name: Quick Sliver
oracle_text:
Flash
Any player may cast Sliver spells as though they had flash.
flavor_text: The directors of the Riptide Project wanted instant results on the sliver experiments. They got their wish.

name: Shaleskin Plower
oracle_text:
Morph {4}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Shaleskin Plower is turned face up, destroy target land.

name: Skinthinner
oracle_text:
Morph {3}{B}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Skinthinner is turned face up, destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

name: Skirk Marauder
oracle_text:
Morph {2}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Skirk Marauder is turned face up, it deals 2 damage to any target.

name: Skirk Outrider
oracle_text: As long as you control a Beast, Skirk Outrider gets +2/+2 and has trample.
flavor_text: Once the goblins thought about it, they preferred being atop a slateback to being in front of, behind, or underneath one.

name: Smokespew Invoker
oracle_text: {7}{B}: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The Mirari festers in its flesh.

name: Sootfeather Flock
oracle_text:
Flying
Morph {3}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor_text: They pick at the remains of the city's corpse.

name: Starlight Invoker
oracle_text: {7}{W}: You gain 5 life.
flavor_text: The Mirari glows in her eyes.

name: Stonewood Invoker
oracle_text: {7}{G}: Stonewood Invoker gets +5/+5 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The Mirari pulses in his veins.

name: Timberwatch Elf
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves on the battlefield.
flavor_text: Even through the Mirari's voice, the elves still hear the call of their kinship.

name: Vile Deacon
oracle_text: Whenever Vile Deacon attacks, it gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Clerics on the battlefield.
flavor_text: "The Cabal and the Order really aren't that different. After all, we are both empowered by faith."

name: Voidmage Apprentice
oracle_text:
Morph {2}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Voidmage Apprentice is turned face up, counter target spell.

name: Wall of Hope
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Whenever Wall of Hope is dealt damage, you gain that much life.
flavor_text:
"What cage would you rather be inside of than out?"
—Daru riddle

name: Whipgrass Entangler
oracle_text: {1}{W}: Until end of turn, target creature gains "This creature can't attack or block unless its controller pays {1} for each Cleric on the battlefield."
flavor_text: "Now that I have your attention, perhaps I can tell you of the Order."

name: Wingbeat Warrior
oracle_text:
Flying
Morph {2}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
